website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and easy-to-use audio splitter that won't break your budget.
pros: Splits into five auxiliary ports, enabling you to share sound with up to five people
ABS plastic construction ensures the splitter is lightweight and durable
PVC cable offers plenty of length
Sold in a variety of attractive colors to complement your personal style
cons: Produces significant static in comparison to similar splitters
Tends to weaken sound each time an audio signal is split

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Amazon Basics earphone splitter! Worked nicely! 💯
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this ear phones splitter for my parents recent Scotland trip and my mother and father reported that it worked perfectly allowing them to enjoy movies on the plane together sharing one screen in peace and quiet for others near by. They said the sound quality reception was normal without any issues. I hope this helps someone make a decision. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver. On the plane, this tiny little gadget allowed my 3 kids to watch a movie together on one laptop. They were quiet for hours. It saved so much fighting and bickering. I wish I had ordered one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: 1SmartCookie

customer_reviews.title: Secure, but does not easily release
customer_reviews.text: When inserting headphones, make sure you hear it click. The click means that it is secured to the splitter; however, the click also means that it will take some finger muscle/force to pull the headphones out. To remove your headphones, pull at the end where the cord and the splitter meet, DON'T pull the cord hoping the splitter will release your headphones because you could stretch the cord/or damage your headphones that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Consistent on all five channels, rugged construction
customer_reviews.text: I have used probably a dozen splitters over the years. Most of which of the two cable variety. They all seemed defective and unreliable, and delivered patchy or inconsistent signals. This splitter is fantastic!! I am a DJ and often play back to back with friends. We plug one of these guys into the mixer and can all listen to queued tracks and chip in on the mix. Consistent delivery to all five channels. Durable construction. Nice feel on the cord. Nice snap in the plugs. The extra little 3" aux is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaMusicMom

customer_reviews.title: If you have 4 enemies
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the product for you. You can enjoy distorted sound quality while sharing it with your closest friends. Product is easy to install but sound quality is split between 5 people. Some will hear the bass while others will enjoy the treble all in one device.
customer_reviews.author: JOE BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and with no loss of audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this splitter at a good price and really good quality. I don't have other splitters to compare it to but this feels nice and thick and I actually read in other reviews that a nice feature is that the cable clicks into place. This is very true and make it feel secure and won't slip out or just be tugged out. You hear a nice click and it all stays in place. I didn't notice any loss un audio quality or volume when we connected three headphones to it so I'm happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Manny23

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: It does a very good job in splitting the audio output. We use it in our room when we don't want to wake up the kids with a long chord. Five outlets also works well if we want to use it on a car video screen during long drives if adults want some peace of mind. It does drop volume when you connect any additional headphone. I did not notice any distortion. Bright color makes it easy to spot in the room, since it is a small unit. As for durability, time alone will tell...
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Group listening in shared spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a number of purposes, but it’s generally some variation of kids in the car, or on the bus, or somewhere else where the youngin’s want to share a video or song without disturbing others. Also helpful for watching a movie in the hotel room when the kids are sleeping. In the classroom one group of students can listen to a story or lesson together during quiet time. The only caveats are that you have to have headphones or earbuds for everybody, and the cords need to be long enough so that people don’t have to be leaning in or crowding each other. I recommend either audio jack extension cables or headphones with long cords.
customer_reviews.author: Sine Nomine

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. When I first saw it I thought it was something else. I thought I could plug multiple sources of sound devices into it and playback on one set of speakers. Oh no. One input device outputted to multiple speakers, headphones etc ... Although it didn't meet my original need, I like this device for what it does and will keep it and expand my set of speakers from currently one set to at most 5. Good product. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A clever, useful, budget-friendly audio-splitter
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple device that does what it is intended to do: it splits the audio from a single source into multiple identical audio signals that it sends to a maximum of five separate headphones. Note that individual users can't adjust their specific volumes. A portable and affordable must-have for parents and couples who would like to utilize wired headphones to share a single audio source. I use it for a mobile podcast, so that each participant can monitor the audio, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it. Spend more on something more reliable
customer_reviews.text: I used this device to be able to connect my PC and Chromecast Audio to the same set of edifiers speakers. The product has a pretty cheap plastic feel to it. It feels very light and hollow. It works for both of my audio devices well but there was one major problem. If two devices are plugged in a the same time then theres a weird humming sound in the background. When playing audio its not that noticable but one you turn all devices off its pretty annoying. After troubleshooting by using different cables and devices nothing could help. I wouldnt buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Delay
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me however I have two male aux cords connected in these so I can have sound from two different speaker's ( Bose & Alcatel Lancing) but one the speakers has a delay. So maybe buy a more expensive one and look at their specs if you're planning on doing something like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Antonne W.

customer_reviews.title: Set the Movie Atmosphere with these + movie + headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a house as a guest or in a house that needs silence this is perfect for movie watchers! You can hook this up to your TV or Gaming system of choice and plug everyone watching in with their own headphones. Makes for a nice "movie" atmosphere because nobody is talking (too busy listening to the movie as it should be). Its been a great help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Have to adjust the headphones slightly to get the sound to come through, but it’s the perfect solution for my husband and I to watch movies together on long flights.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom's listening center and I first I loved it! However, it stopped working properly before the year ended. So it didn't last me even 8 months. Now granted it was used by 6 year old children. The students didn't really need to touch it or mess with it in order to use it. All they had to do is pick up a headphone and press play. So I am not sure why it doesn't work anymore. I am currently shopping for another one since this is a new school year and I need one. Hopefully I can find one more reliable. I usually love Amazon products, but this one really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter
customer_reviews.text: While the 5 connections are overkill, it was a great and inexpensive way to split the audio. My wife and I use it when we are watching a show in our bedroom and the kids are still trying to fall asleep right next door in their bedrooms. We connect this to the headphone jack on our Roku remote, and then two pairs of headphones to the splitter. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Petersen

customer_reviews.title: does its job.
customer_reviews.text: when i use the splitter as my output source, my computer makes a ringing sound. i had to just put the setting as the headphone port instead. only output sources are recognized by my computer. if you have speakers and a headset plugged in, it'll play through both but it won't recognize that there's a mic.
customer_reviews.author: zh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My husband and I use it for playing games and recording on his laptop. Sound quality is great for the multiple headphone attached and is super simple to use. We've only had to use it with two headphones at a time so far, but we love the freedom of being able to include multiple friends with the device.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: Did I need all 5 ports? No. I only needed 2. But why only get 2 when you can get 5! All the ports worked fine and had clear audio. It came in a nice little box. Long audio jacks will stick out a little because the outlets on the splitter are short.
customer_reviews.author: Kiros

customer_reviews.title: Useful little accessory.
customer_reviews.text: This headphone splitter is a pretty useful accessory to own. I’ve used it to listen to music while on a road trip with my family. It’s small enough to fit in a pocket. The sound was pretty decent; the volume decreased a tad bit when a new pair of headphones was added, but that is to be expected. I’m glad I bought this splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Annik

customer_reviews.title: Wired is always better
customer_reviews.text: Combined this with a 15 foot headphone extension to listen to tv at night. Works great and with wired, no annoying delay between person speaking on tv and what you hear that you sometimes get with wireless.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Great but it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel product that worked the majority of the time. if you are just doing some music sharing while traveling or leisure use, this is a great tool. If you are trying to use this for serious music use, I would recommend something of a higher quality. Great value for money though.
customer_reviews.author: Chance The Drone Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's great so me and my husband listen while our new ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this to watch our roku cause it has a headphone jack on the remote. It's great so me and my husband listen while our new born baby is fast asleep in her bassinet and the TV noise won't wake her up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheless

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschool Pod!
customer_reviews.text: Having a virtual school pod has been a challenge this year. This thing has helped so much! I plug 3 kids into one laptop with this! No echo or bandwidth suck from 3 different laptops! It’s been amazing so far. We are only one week in using. I’ll update if things change! Came with an extra cord i used to extend the ‘snowflake’ (we call it) from the laptop so they weren’t all up on top of each other.
customer_reviews.author: jo richer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This splitter works well, and I like that it has so many ports, even though we really only need two of them, most of the time. My only complaint is that it seems really tough both to plug jacks into the female ports, and to remove them - like it's a really tight fit or something. But this isn't too big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: WOW and WOW.
customer_reviews.text: WOW and WOW. This thing is SO SOLID! It almost clamps down on the headphones put into it with an audible SNAP that holds them in place. So impressed. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kipchak

customer_reviews.title: Low quality connector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year to connect to my Kindle Fire, so that when I'm traveling, I could watch something on my Kindle and share the audio with my travel companion. On the way back from the trip, the connector had gotten so bad that it'll only work if I held the connector (end that connects to Kindle) at a certain angle. Any movement would cause the volume to be incredibly low that it was inaudible. The Kindle works fine if I connect a pair of headphones directly. This is the first AmazonBasics product I've bought that's been low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Ketha

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: A life saver!! I use this when I need more one-on-one time with one of my kiddos as we homeschool. I’ll set the other two to listen to an audiobook while the other one gets my full attention. Or all three to listen and draw as a boon plays. Easy to use and compatible with my iPhone made this device even more useful when taking the road trip to grandma’s house. All three kiddos can watch the movie, mom and dad can listen to the radio and there be no overlays!
customer_reviews.author: Momma^6

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Price; No noticeable degrade in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is good for the price point but 1 of the ports does not work as a cable will not fit in it. It still works for my application as I do not need all ports. I don't notice any degrade in sound quality once speakers plugged into the splitter vs direct. I would rate 5 stars if all ports would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: AaronSquire

customer_reviews.title: Sound is unevenly distributed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered other audio splitters in the past and this one by far has lasted the longest. My only issue is that these sometimes have a hard time balancing out/distributing sound to each headset. For example, I put in a new pair of earplugs that works find when using a phone’s audio jack alone, but once I put them into the multi jack, only one ear piece would work one each headset. I’m not an audio tech, so I don’t know if that’s bound to happen with gadgets like this or it was just the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Classroom Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my classroom. My students are a little rough on equipment so I was looking for an affordable, brightly colored splitter. And I couldn't beat the price of these! So far they've held up great! I especially like how the connectors are a bit more grippy than other splitters so headphone jacks don't fall out. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for music recording
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, it even comes with additional aux cords. So sometimes you need multiple people to have earbuds or headphones. This is the necessary tool because your electronics don't have enough IO ports. So split it and allow multiple singers to go simultaneously!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and worked well but the length of time wasn’t long. It only worked for a few months-maybe 6 in my classroom. I made sure that it was taken care of well. It just stopped working one day. Maybe a dud. Great price but don’t expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Paredez

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few uses - short return window.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. My students and I used this product fewer than five times, and the return window was so short that I can't even get a replacement. Now it only works through one ear. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good for most situations
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound and I liked how sturdy the connections felt when making them. There is some volume attenuation. I bought the splitter to use on a scanner at an auto race and found it a bit difficult to hear at times when using it, compared to when I plugged my headphones directly into the scanner. I think using the splitter in most other everyday situations would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We had 4 headphones plugged into this and there was no decrease in sound quality. My kids and I were listening to a recording on my Mac laptop. They thought it was really fun. I don't use it often but it does exactly what I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this splitter for a long flight with 2 others in order to all 3 watch the same movie from my tablet or my sister's laptop. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M.

customer_reviews.title: We use it frequently
customer_reviews.text: We use it when my wife's asleep and my son and I wish to watch a movie together. Works very well, and no discernible issue with the sound through the headphones. Love it, and my wife's happy because she can sleep undisturbed (I like movies loud).
customer_reviews.author: Thorny

customer_reviews.title: Airplane + 1 iPad + Splitter = 3 happy kids!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you need it to do and beats daisy-chaining dual headphone splitters together. I am not sure when I will use 5 headphones together, but it sure did keep 3 kids happy watching movies on a cross country flight!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Niles

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this five way headphone splitter, I've used it on road trips, or if my friends and I are just listening together. This works very well and I use it with my adapter since I have an iphone 7. Also, if you are listening with only two, one, three, pretty much anything less than five it will still work with no difference in sound quality. Such a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This headphone splitter works exactly as advertised. All five channels are in stereo and there is zero sound loss. Great item if you want multiple people to listen to the same sound source in stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with this product! I fly often with my guy and this is a necessity for watching movies together on long flights. Even came with a cute little pouch. I've definitely gotten my moneys worth already.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Tested only once will update later
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to use with the nintendo switch to share sound during a 1.5 day of driving down for a week vacation. We don't leave for 11 days but i tested it with my phone with one pair of Dr dre solo 3 headphones and a bose headphones. Both sounded fantastic with no issues. But will update when used during trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tigressthegreat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This comes in very handy when you want to share what you're listening to with others. I have used this to watch movies on my tablet while flying. My partner and I were able to listen to the same movie with separate headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple product that does just as it says it will, I have had no issues with any sound quality when using this device although I am not using professional grade sound equipment or anything like that. Also be aware that this is for Audio only, if you have a headset with mic / headphones combo the mic will NOT work through this device.
customer_reviews.author: sdaoud

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is a little lower than some splitters I have but they have less splits. I used this to send signal to multi computer speakers and a separate tv in my office.
customer_reviews.author: tinkiller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small, can share with multiple people. Perfect for for sharing audio with multiple people and only one device while traveling. Almost never use all 5 jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Marks

customer_reviews.title: Split the audio signal
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my computer because if I choose not to turn on my speakers, I can still listen with my headphones. I coupled it with a Bluetooth adapter and my wife can listen with her Bluetooth headphones so we don't have to worry about waking up our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Billclay377

customer_reviews.title: If u r old school not blue tooth and wanting to share
customer_reviews.text: The audio output of a headphone jack . For instance u have a cheapie portable DVD player and two of you want to listen ( we camp so u have to keep quiet late at night ) these work just fine. Just remember that old school cords eliminate radiation hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Marc F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom's listening center and am pleased to say that it is very easy to use. The only issue is that the sound quality isn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: khf

customer_reviews.title: Using it with the Zoom H6 field recorder
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to use for my multi-guest podcast (Music Industry Insiders). I use it with the Zoom H6 field recorder and it allows myself and all of our guests to hear themselves. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hibard, MPA

customer_reviews.title: BezosBasics basically suck
customer_reviews.text: Well, right out of the box there is static and basically a short in the main line. You know, like when you rotate the plug it sounds fuzzy? BezosBasics suck. Bezos sucks. Amazon sucks.
customer_reviews.author: HandsomePete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8th grade teacher, and I wanted a way for students to listen to instructional videos and audiobooks in small groups together. This adapter was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea but only two of the outlet worked very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: nathalie

customer_reviews.title: don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Awful product after reading the reviews i was excited but nope it doesn't work...of course
customer_reviews.author: Kellie B

customer_reviews.title: Great for online school
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help with online school. I have two kids working beside each other and this Allows me to listen in to either of them with my own headset.
customer_reviews.author: tom waltman

customer_reviews.title: You're better off spending more money for better quality
customer_reviews.text: While the product does what it's supposed to, it almost "splits" the volume between each plug so it is very quiet. I got this to use for my chromebook on a plane and I couldn't hear the movie at all with the volume all the way up so we had to put on subtitles.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Loud ringing after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, does it's job. Or, rather, it did at one point. Worked well at first, sound quality wasn't that bad at first, but then after a few months with it, it started to have this really bad ringing sound in the background of music, game sounds, etc. I have since stopped using it but it was good when it didn't ring.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it works
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and it works. Was able to power 5 sets of Bose noise cancelling headphones off of a single laptop output. (I was concerned I'd need to amplify the input to drive this many devices)
customer_reviews.author: The Matterhorn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed so that all three of my grandchildren could listen to my iPad while traveling with their headphones on.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had a recording session where I had 10 people singing listening to headphones, so I bought two of these and each headphone played the music fine.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Pungin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer for watching movies on airplane using same iPad for my littles. Worked great. Volume control varied but mostly great.
customer_reviews.author: Lovleigh22

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: The headphone slots are loose and finicky. I often have to pull slightly out to get a good connection. When connection is solid if works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Mcmurrin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: This splitter worked fine for a couple of weeks, but after two short months it failed to work anymore. I checked the headphones connected and all of them worked on another device, so I know it is the splitter that stopped working. Very disappointed that I spent money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay E. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Defective, broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Cable broke the splitter off ten minutes into our long-haul plane flight with the kids. Fiasco. Seven bucks wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro Protagonist

customer_reviews.title: Sure, buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap plasticy looking thing, and doesn't have a lot in the style department. It's pretty cheaply designed, but hey, it's only Amazon Basics. It does what it's supposed to do. It works. And it even comes with a 3.5 to 3.5 mm cord. So why not?
customer_reviews.author: Mayo...naise

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My kids used these with their tablets on trips to games and it was nice because a friend could watch the same movie with them. I bought 2 different colors of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids sharing devices on airplanes and car rides!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for airplane rides and car rides when sharing a device with kids. No longer do they have to fight over headphones. You have to use them especially on airplanes they do not allow the volume to be turned up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good to know that you are looking forward to improve ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good to know that you are looking forward to improve your product line and I love the way you do that. The product needs to be improved and get gold plated to transmit a better sound quality. Thank you for emailing me and love to contact me again.
customer_reviews.author: Majed Aiesh

customer_reviews.title: Qualified product
customer_reviews.text: Streaming & splitting audio to different channels. The audio connections are good, tight connections.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Yosef Roffeh

customer_reviews.title: Output only, not input
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mac. I have a Yeti Mic, but I was wanting something with which we could use our headphone mics. I like it and I will still use it. Will amend my rating (re: volume/sound quality after we hook multiple headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Verum Apparatus

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to have my 3 boys watch movies on my iPad while we travelled cross country. Works perfectly, we don’t have to listen to what they are watching, so stress levels driving are down...
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few months. Still works and gets the job done. Using it for a logitech z506 5.1 hooked up to my tv via aux. When i got it one of the inputs didnt work, which wasnt really a problem for me since i only use 3 of them
customer_reviews.author: efren

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classroom
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for have different stations in my classroom. With this multiple students can listen to the same song or watch a video on the same device. No sound issues at all! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Works well for short term use volume is finicky.
customer_reviews.text: We needed one for the airplane, was a last minute buy, works okay the sound is a little finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Toribio

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only thing is you have to make sure you force plug all the way in, otherwise sound doesn't work properly. That much force is not normal when using plugs.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to split a click track to 5 other musicians in a pit orchestra and it worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Jones

customer_reviews.title: works almost  to simple
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm no complaints though you will have to go into settings on both computers and make sure the sound is working on both.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Scott

customer_reviews.title: Green
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to use this in my classroom for small group instruction. FYI neon green just looks green to me.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This helped three grandsons do their homework together and stay focused while all of them listened to the same background music.
customer_reviews.author: P. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay up (the cable is too firm) so that's a little annoying but does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small group
customer_reviews.text: Great for small groups at school so they can do group/station work without disturbing other groups.
customer_reviews.author: B. Radacs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gaming room
customer_reviews.text: You will want this if you want to connect more than one speaker
customer_reviews.author: Hero Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Super cool gadget for flying. Hubs and I watch the same movie on iPad. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jwow

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great
customer_reviews.text: Great came on time.. I needed it for recording and its worked out great .
customer_reviews.author: Rq

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kindergarten listening center. It was easy for them to hook up to and they couldn’t mess around with the set volume I had on the player. Much better than the previous one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Multiple Kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for use with an iPad during a long flight. Both kids were able to easily hear the movie and games as they played.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Went on a recent flight and my mom, sister and myself attached our headsets to ipad to watch a movie together. Fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great for 2 or more people to listen to or watch something with audio
customer_reviews.author: the rose

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is great to share videos on the iPad or IPhone. Five pple can plug in their earbuds and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to share movies on long flights
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our cross country flight so we could all listen to a movie on my daughters laptop. The sound quality was great for all 3 of us. We bought the blue one so it would be easy to find in our carry on bag. I would highly recommend sine no sound quality was lost
customer_reviews.author: Kacsil

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and straightforward. Arrived fast. Feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a plain, passive multiple adapter that works. Each earphone/spkr you plug into it will reduce the sound output on the others. But that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: We love to travel and we still like to watch out favorite shows. We would hate to disturbed lodgers, so this is a perfect, hackable solution. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MysteryAuthor

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is in use daily and works well. Bought it months ago.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have multiple speakers connected to my computer and no feedback or hum from multiple sources. Love em
customer_reviews.author: Haireball

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all. The only good was that it was easy to return. A huge bummer because we got this for a trip and likely won’t get a new one in time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Kids fighting?
customer_reviews.text: Gets the kids to stop fighting over the sound when using the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dok

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Cost-effective and works like a charm — definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Nap

customer_reviews.title: Multi-listener made possible
customer_reviews.text: I watch DVDs on a portable DVD player with several friends at a noisy bookstore. The three of us were able to hear beautifully once we all had the compatible earphones
customer_reviews.author: Oneredrose

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 5-Way Multi Headphone Audio Splitter Connector, Black
feature_bullets: Headphone adapter splits line into 5 auxiliary (3.5mm) ports for easily sharing sound with up to 5 people
Works with any device with an AUX port, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more
Can deliver sound to 5 headphones at a time; auxiliary cable included for connecting to a device
Mix songs easily; use the standard controls of each connected device for mixing and fade-ins
Made of ABS plastic with a PVC cable; compact size; choice of color; great for travel or classroom; backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty
